task_descriptions: You (@PersonName-1) just finished your appointment with @DoctorName-1 and would like to followup to ensure you understood everything.

You (@PersonName-1) just finished your appointment with @DoctorName-1. Unfortunately, you forgot to write down the instructions the doctor gave you. Please followup and find out how often to take your medicine.

Wizard.task_description: Inform the user of his/her doctor's orders.
